abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews restaurant B & K French Cuisine in Harlem.

headline.print_headline: A Chef on a Mission to Bring Paris to Harlem
headline.main: B & K French Cuisine Brings Paris to Harlem

keywords.value: B & K French Cuisine (Manhattan, NY, Restaurant)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: With high hopes and no gas, a classically trained chef is on a mission: ‘Fast food doesn’t mean bad food anymore!’
lead_paragraph: With high hopes and no gas, a classically trained chef is on a mission: ‘Fast food doesn’t mean bad food anymore!’
